snippet: Coming out of the Super Bowl in February, the signing-competition appeared to be headed for ratings domination, but then the competition got stiffer. Still, "The Voice" has made NBC tops on Monday night, when it used to be invisible.
abstract: Coming out of the Super Bowl in February, the signing-competition appeared to be headed for ratings domination, but then the competition got stiffer. Still, "The Voice" has made NBC tops on Monday night, when it used to be invisible.

headline.main: 'The Voice' May Not Be a Blockbuster, but It Is a Lifeline for NBC
